languages.text: "Еретики явили себя и жаждут боя? Отлично! Они его получат. Корабль да будет очищен от скверны".
"The heretics have revealed themselves and are eager to fight? Then fight we shall! Let the vessel be purged of their filth!"
languages.original_text: "Еретики явили себя и жаждут боя? Отлично! Они его получат. Корабль да будет очищен от скверны".

traits.locale_text: "The heretics have revealed themselves and are eager to fight? Then fight we shall! The ship will be purged of their crawling taint."
"The heretics have revealed themselves and are eager to fight? Then fight we shall! The ship will be purged of their crawling taint."

"The heretics have revealed themselves and are eager to fight? Then fight we shall! Let the vessel be purged of their filth!"
"The heretics have revealed themselves and are eager to fight? Then fight we shall! Let the vessel be purged of their filth!"

languages.text: «¿Los herejes se han mostrado y buscan pelea? ¡Pues pelea tendrán! ¡Purgaremos la nave de su impureza!».
languages.original_text: "The heretics have revealed themselves and are eager to fight? Then fight we shall! Let the vessel be purged of their filth!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Los herejes se han mostrado y buscan pelea? ¡Pues pelea tendrán! ¡Purgaremos la nave de su impureza!».

languages.text: 「異端者たちが姿を現し、戦おうとしているんですか？では戦いましょうよ！器から汚物を祓うんです！汚れを洗い流しましょう！」
languages.original_text: "The heretics have revealed themselves and are eager to fight? Then fight we shall! Let the vessel be purged of their filth!"

traits.locale_text: 「異端者たちが姿を現し、戦おうとしているんですか？では戦いましょうよ！器から汚物を祓うんです！汚れを洗い流しましょう！」

languages.text: “异端分子现身了，还想和我们开战？很好，那就开战吧！让我们肃清这艘船上异端的污秽！”
languages.original_text: "The heretics have revealed themselves and are eager to fight? Then fight we shall! Let the vessel be purged of their filth!"

traits.locale_text: “异端分子现身了，还想和我们开战？很好，那就开战吧！让我们肃清这艘船上异端的污秽！”

languages.text: "Die Ketzer haben sich offenbart und wollen kämpfen? Dann werden wir kämpfen! Damit das Schiff von ihrem Schmutz gereinigt wird!"
languages.original_text: "The heretics have revealed themselves and are eager to fight? Then fight we shall! Let the vessel be purged of their filth!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Ketzer haben sich offenbart und wollen kämpfen? Dann werden wir kämpfen! Damit das Schiff von ihrem Schmutz gereinigt wird!"

languages.text: « Les hérétiques ont tombé le masque et ils veulent en découdre ? Qu'à cela ne tienne ! Purgeons le vaisseau de leur souillure ! »
languages.original_text: "The heretics have revealed themselves and are eager to fight? Then fight we shall! Let the vessel be purged of their filth!"

traits.locale_text: « Les hérétiques ont tombé le masque et ils veulent en découdre ? Qu'à cela ne tienne ! Purgeons le vaisseau de leur souillure ! »

languages.text: "Kâfirler, savaşmaya hevesli olduklarını ilan mı etti? Öyleyse biz de savaşırız! Gemiyi bu pisliklerden arındırın!"
languages.original_text: "The heretics have revealed themselves and are eager to fight? Then fight we shall! Let the vessel be purged of their filth!"
